title: UPDATE: 7-year-old Quincy girl killed in Adams County; name released
content:
Adams County Coroner Jim Keller confirms with KHQA that a 7-year-old girl was killed Friday afternoon.
According to a news release from the Adam County Sheriffs Office, authorities received reports of a girl who had a gunshot wound shortly after 1 p.m. Friday.
The incident happened at a residence near Beverly, Illinois.
Keller released the name of the victim Saturday morning - Melina H. Torres of Quincy.
Currently the child's death is under investigation by the Adams County Sheriff's Office.
Torres' services will be held at Duker and Haugh Funeral Home in Quincy - visitation will be from 4 to 7 p.m. on Tuesday, May 24th with funeral services at 11 a.m. on Wednesday, May 25th.
